TopicTitle: A Mod made me lose my stock engines!

Articles.Content:
As the Title says, a mod has caused my lvt-30, lvt-45 and mainsail engines to disappear completely, rendering quite a few of my ships useless.

I know that Some people will say "Reinstall the game then!" But i would rather not go through an hour long download.

If someone could offer up a link or something to a download for just those parts it would be much appreciated!

(Not sure if i put this in the right place, If not could a mod kindly move this over to the appropriate place.)

Edited December 15, 2013 by Krosulhah

Are you using Steam? Just verify the integrity of the game cache in the properties page for KSP.

Is it a store download? Do you still have the zip?

I'm not using steam, i bought it straight from the website, and it was the Engine FX mod, though, this is obviously my own fault as i have realized i forgot to hit merge, whereas i hit move and replace....
Unfortunately I can't send you those files, but the patcher should be able to repair KSP for you, look in the KSP folder for the patcher.exe or use the KSP launcher to start it

Oh, Didn't think about patcher.... Thanks! Trying it now.

EDIT: Worked perfectly! Thanks Sal!

Edited December 15, 2013 by Krosulhah
